title: Do I deserve gold?
body:
I dont know. Imma just spam games and hope that I get to gold. Just wondering about the community, lolking me or op.gg me and from my match history tell me if you think I will get to gold eventually. I will check the replies after every game and I will post if I make it to gold.

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/323458
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=spontanious+burn

replies.body: Nah, you deserve silver I, because you're in silver I. If you make it to gold then you'll deserve gold, but right now you only deserve Silver I.
If you spam games enough and maintain a 50% win rate you will get gold
Apparently molendo got gold, took him 800 games this season though, but it leads me to believe that anyone could get gold if they played enough.

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KMgqTbz3,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-21T10:42:43.508+0000)
>
> Apparently molendo got gold, took him 800 games this season though, but it leads me to believe that anyone could get gold if they played enough.

Say that to me because I could spend 1 year trying to get Silver but it ain't happening.
how bout stop being a %%%% and link it for us. lazy %%%%ter wants everyone else to do the leg work.
I could click on abilities and turn my monitor upside down and get gold. It's pretty easy.
